name: Bloodsoaked Ruins
description: A long spear tainted black by unrelenting battle, it shines with an ethereal glow beneath the ghostly blue light of lantern-fire.
bonus: For 3.5s after using an Elemental Burst, the equipping character's Lunar-Charged DMG dealt to opponents is increased by 36%/48%/60%/72%/84%. Additionally, after triggering a Lunar-Charged reaction, the equipping character will gain Requiem of Ruin: CRIT DMG is increased by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56% for 6s. They will also regain 12/13/14/15/16 Elemental Energy. Elemental Energy can be restored this way once every 14s.
